medical_history.chief_complaint: RUQ abdominal pain following eating, nausea, and vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented with sharp RUQ abdominal pain radiating to the right lower back which began two hours after a spaghetti dinner, following discharge from a previous hospital where she had the same pain six days prior. Symptoms were aggravated by eating; unable to identify any alleviating factors. No change in bowel habits, however, noted going four days without a bowel movement while hospitalized.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Insulin-dependent diabetes mellitus with nephropathy (on dialysis), neuropathy, retinopathy, hypothyroidism, hypercholesterolemia.
medical_history.family_history: Cousin and uncle with brain cancer (unknown type), sister with CAD.
